channel.title: Vue.js on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Vue.js on Home

item.title: Vue Reactivity in Depth
item.description: The official document has a good high level explanation on how Vue tracks reactive data, and a pretty graph. Although for people who are curious about the details, I’ll give it a try on explain it from my little understanding. We are going to walk through each component and explain how they interact step by step, so you should be able to understand the whole picture in the end.
